/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/cc  -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/vulkan.dir/vulkan.c.o CMakeFiles/vulkan.dir/__/deps/glad_vulkan.c.o  -o vulkan -Wl,-rpath,/Users/liuqian8/Desktop/glfw-3.3/src ../src/libglfw.3.3.dylib
